enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Juniors & Seniors
title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-22 Topics in Communication Studies
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Juniors/Seniors Only

Undergraduate Students Only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Big data is currency, to those initiated in the nuts and bolts of data science. This hands-on data literacy course introduces cutting edge research on cultural markets. Students will learn how to plot and interpret graphs that measure performance in a cultural market; use Internet search data, Google's Ngram Viewer, and Twitter conversations to forecast trends; build, visualize, and explore networks; and use Amazon's Mechanical Turk for crowdsourcing. Accept an open mind, there are no prerequisites for the class. While formal thinking is encouraged, the course focuses on providing conceptual foundations and tools that apply across a variety of creative sectors.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Students must bring either a laptop or tablet with internet access.

subject: COMM_ST
